text: qula- 'ayuha alrasula- lahuma: 'iiniy la aqdr 'an 'adfae eankum drana, wala 'ajlib lakum nfeana, qulan: 'iiniy lan yanqidhani min eadhab allah 'ahad 'iin easayatahu, walan 'ajid min dunih malja afrr 'iilayh min eadhabihi, lkn 'amlik 'an 'ubalighukum ean allah ma 'amarani bitablighih lakum, wrsaltah alty 'arsilni biha 'iilaykum. wman yaes allah warasulaha, wyuerd ean din allahi, fa'iina jaza'ah nar jahanam la yakhruj minha abdana
